# MRS converter (converter hook extension)

`brkraw-mrs` is an optional converter hook extension for BrkRaw that adds
MRS-focused specs, rules, and transforms. It is designed to keep MRS-specific
logic outside the core while enabling NIfTI-MRS output and related workflows.

Project links:

- BrkRaw MRS page: <https://brkraw.github.io/brkraw-mrs>
- GitHub repository: <https://github.com/BrkRaw/brkraw-mrs>
